job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Computer Vision/Machine Learning Engineer (100% REMOTE)</strong></p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Required:</strong></p><ul><li>Experience with Python focusing on image and video processing.</li><li>Working with public/private large-scale data sets of image/video</li><li>At least 1-2 year of deep learning (academy or industry) experience with TensorFlow.</li><li>Graduate degree on CS, CE or EE.</li><li>Research experience on computer vision or machine learning.</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Desired:</strong></p><ul><li>Experience with AI on chip is a plus.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><br></p><p>jobs@erginc.com</p>
